radiographic_examinations.findings: Large retrocecal appendix with diffuse wall thickening and three fecoliths. Mild periportal edema. Small bowel appears mostly decompressed. There is fecalized material within the distal segment of the ileum. The appendix is dilated measuring up to 12 mm in maximal diameter with adjacent free fluid. No evidence of perforation. Mild levoscoliosis of the lumbar spine.
